AbnExperimentCohort.name: AbnExperimentCohort
AbnExperimentCohort.description: Represents the specified audience that's participating in an A/B/n experiment.

AbnExperimentId.description: Unique identifier that refers to a related experiment.

AllocationWeight.description: Percentage of an audience to experience the selected part of the experiment.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Three letter ISO currency codes for supported currencies. Optional.

DataSpaceId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the data space where an experiment cohort's resources originate. Required.

Description.description: Text description of the experiment. Optional.

DeveloperName.description: System or user-generated API name for the experiment. Required.

IsControl.description: Whether the cohort is used as the control group that performance is checked against.

Name.description: Text label that identifies the experiment cohort. Required.

PersonalizerId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the personalizer thatâ€™s related to the experiment cohort.
